title: ollanO shrI hari
sahitya:
ollanO shrI hari koLLanO


anupallavi

  ella sAdhanaviddu tulasi illada pUje


caraNam 1    sindhu shata kOTi gangOdakaviddu gandha su-parimaLa vastraviddu 
canduLLa AbharaNa dhUpa dIpagaLiddu brndAvana shrI tulasi illada pUje
    caraNam 2    dadhi kSIra modalAda abhiSEkagaLiddu madhuparka pancOpacAraviddu 
mudadinda muddu shrI krSNana pUjage sadamalaLADa shrI tulasi illada pUje
    caraNam 3    mantra hAra mantra puSpa sUktagaLiddu tant tappade tantra sARaviddu 
santata sukha sampUrNa pUjege atyanta priyaLAda tulasi illada pUje
    caraNam 4    kamala mallige jAji sampige kEdige vimala khaNDe panca vADyagaLiddu 
amala pancapakSya paramAnnagaLiddu kamala nAbhanu shrI tulasi illada pUje
    caraNam 5    pUjeya mADade tulasi manjariyinda mU-jagadOdeya murAriyanu 
rAjAdi rAjanenmba mantra puSpagaLinda pUjisidaru olla purandara viTTalanu
